abstract: In his annual Berkshire Hathaway letter, Warren E. Buffett recently urged investors to pose tough questions at the shareholders meeting in May. Here is one that The New York Times’s David Segal says is on the mind of some Buffett watchers: When are you going to fix Moody’s?

headline.main: Buffett Is Unusually Silent on Rating Agencies
